name: SF-IO
description:
An Old-School Science-Fiction Adventure RPG Game.

SF-IO is an amazing space adventure with some role-playing elements. You can earn money, buy space ships, objects and trade with wares. This time, you need to save the world and reconnect a decentralized network around the solar system!

Highlights:

- 10 different planets and space ships to visit in the solar system
- 3 amazing space ships
- Travel with space ships, train, boat...
- Trade between the planet shops
- Figure out spacy landscapes and mysterious places
- Talk to people and figure out the amazing story
- Solve problems and accomplish important missions

This software is licensed under the GPL v2.

Languages available: English, Esperanto

SF-IO just got an amazing sequel: SpaceNET. Don't miss it!

Get it here: https://sonejo.itch.io/spacenet
